Apple Guides.description: Find comprehensive guides to deploy, secure, and certify Apple platforms.

Apple Training.description: Explore training tutorials for Apple device support, deployment, management, and more.

Apple Developer.description: Resources for Apple developers including beta programs and GitHub repositories.

context.Apple Beta Software Program: Contribute to shaping future releases of iOS, iPadOS, macOS, tvOS, watchOS, and HomePod software by testing pre-release versions.
context.Apple Developer Program: The Apple Developer program provides developers and admins with tools for app creation, code signing, distribution, testing, analytics, and more.
context.Device Management (GitHub): Apple Device management schema data for MDM and Declarative Device management (DDM).

Security.description: Security resources including macOS Security Compliance Project and MITRE ATT&CK.

context.Mitre: The Mitre macOS Matrix is a compilation of tactics and techniques derived from the MITRE ATT&CKÂ® Matrix for Enterprise, specifically focusing on macOS platform.
context.mSCP: The macOS security compliance project is an open source effort to provide a programmatic approach to generating security guidance.

Community Blogs.description: Follow these blogs for updates and insights on macOS and Apple technologies.
